enabled.description: Use on neutral inverse elements such as backgrounds and borders.

hovered.description: Use on neutral inverse elements such as backgrounds and borders, when they are on hover state.

pressed.description: Use on neutral inverse elements such as backgrounds and borders, when they are on press state.

focused.description:
Use on neutral inverse elements such as backgrounds and borders, when they are on focus state.

Accompanied by a focus border: 2px of space between the edge of the component and a black or white border.

dragged.description: Use on neutral inverse elements such as backgrounds and borders, when they are on drag state.
